Summary: The UFOs looked like burning fire embers, but were going up in the sky.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 6 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMy mom was picking me up from a friend's house and then she td me to hurry to the car because she wanted me to see something so I did and she asked me what is that?! They were like stars but I knew they weren't they were UFOs and I know this because rhey were red and orangy like burning fire embers just staring at us then they were slowly disapearing but going up into the sky first there was 10 then they were leaving then 10 more came then they started vanishing then there was 3 then 1 then finally none. My reaction was this is it, we're done here.
